a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of low-pay earners who are female vs GDP per capita, 2015
The vertical axis shows the share of low-pay earners who are female, where 'low pay earners' are those at the
bottom of the hourly earnings distribution (specifically, below two-thirds of median hourly earnings). The horizontal
axis shows GDP per capita, after adjusting for differences in price levels across countries.
Female share of low pay earners (%)
Data source: ILOSTAT, Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
